title: Watercress, citrus and radish salad
description: This simple watercress, citrus and radish salad makes a perfect quick side dish
ingredients: 1 large pink grapefruit, peeled and segmented, plus 2 tbsp of the juice

method.Step 1: Whisk the sugar, wholegrain mustard and some salt and pepper into the grapefruit juice, then whisk in the extra-virgin olive oil.

method.Step 2: Finely slice the radishes and mix with the watercress and grapefruit segments.

method.Step 3: Drizzle with the dressing and serve with roast or barbecued meat or fish.
